price: (8) And We did not make them [i.e., the prophets] forms not eating food,[873] nor were they immortal [on earth].
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ
footnotes: [873]- Like the angels.  Rather, they were human beings with human attributes.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnāhum jasadan lā yakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wamā kānū khālidīna
